Html:
Hello,

it seems to me that it is only possible to approve updates for uninstallation when the update is MSI based. EXE based updates don't give me this option. I think this is because MSI update parameters are added automatically by the wsus logic and the API doesn't offer options for this case - right?

Do you see any way to import EXE updates with option to uninstallation? maybe with different command lines for install / uninstall? Or is the only way to import the update twice with different command lines?

Thanks in advance for you answer.

Greets
Marco

Hello,
I think this is because MSI update parameters are added automatically by the wsus logic and the API doesn't offer options for this case - right?
You are right. Wsus agent only know how to uninstall MSI files. This is a restriction in the API.
Or is the only way to import the update twice with different command lines?
This is how I do.
